reviews.review_text: Awesome microbrewery with a great vibe to it. Beers were delicious with a good mix of your classics (Lager, Pilsner IPA etc) and some more experimental flavours too. I had the Mac n cheese which was delicious. Staff were fantastic good knowledge and happy to give tasters to help you decide which beer to have. 10/10 would recommend :)

Dog-friendly patio with delicious beer and pizza. We started with an order of poutine that was loaded with delicious gravy and perfectly cheesy curds. The beet salad was so fresh and light on a warm day and the margarita pizza was lovely. The crust had a wonderful flavor and was cooked to perfection. All of the beers we had were light but very flavorful. Would definitely visit here again.
Get the flight! Good place to hang out and try out all the beer. The pizza was very good also.

We tried to have lunch here, but on a Monday they were out of meatballs and salads and the poutine was sadly wayyyy too healthy (thus way too un-poutine). Other than that there were many beers, they are open early, beer tasted super fresh, they have craft sodas available and the seats are comfortable.
Great atmosphere and amazing pizza. Definitely will be back for more!! Thank you Food : 5/5

This place rocks. Long tables that are good for larger groups, great mainstay beers with a few experimental ones. Good pizza and dinner choices with a couple legit salad options. Staff are fantastic and social. Can get busy fast. Vegetarian options: The salads are the bomb Kid-friendliness: Well behaved kids are welcome.

My husband and I hosted an event at Strathcona the day before our wedding last month, and it could not have gone more wonderfully. From communication to planning to timing, the owners, management and staff at Strathcona were phenomenal to work with in putting on this event. The food and beer were incredible and the service was amazing. Strathcona was responsive and flexible, and really made us feel like they were excited for us to host the event there. Were very appreciative to have been able to work with Strathcona, and cannot recommend them enough!
Honestly the best pizza in Vancouver. I know it s a brewery, but honestly the BEST pizza in Vancouver. Pair it with the kale salad. You will be happy.

Great spot. Beer & pizzas are both fantastic. The interior is beautiful. That said.. the washrooms are in need of some attention due to the hand driers and disgusting, cheap, little door locks. I mean look at these locks.. no one wants to touch that. I d highly recommend getting a paper towel dispenser and some proper washroom grade door handles that show occupancy and unlock when you press the handle down to open the door.
Really good pizza and beer here. The chilly oil is awesome to put on your pizza. They offer high alcohol beers but also easy to drink ones. Really cool place.
The staff was so thoughtful and custom created a delicious poutine + beef dish for me because I wanted a gluten free meal with meat. My friends enjoyed the pizzas too. Great service and great food!!
We had the pleasure of hosting our Dads 90th Birthday celebration here. Food was excellent, atmoshere-terrific and staff was a pleasure. Looking forward to celebrating Dads 91st here as well!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Such a great time!

reviews.review_text: Came here after a heavy night. Our server, Jake, was so friendly, welcoming, and just plain fun to talk to. Another staff member noticed our table was wobbly and fixed it sooner than later. All in all really enjoyed the service and experience. #transwomanreviews

What an amazing brewery, the beers, the food, the vibe. It s a must see when in the Yeast Van area. My wife doesn t like beer and this is the first brewery she found 2 on tap she loved! We ll be back for sure on our next road trip to Van. 10/10

In the hallowed halls of Strathcona Beer Company, my senses were treated to an extraordinary symphony of flavors and libations, befitting a connoisseurs discerning palate. Amidst this intoxicating tapestry of sensations, my sojourn took an enchanting turn, as I had the pleasure of encountering an exquisite soul gracing the establishment - none other than the esteemed server, Grace. Her service was a graceful dance of refined expertise, a virtuoso performance akin to an orchestral maestro directing a timeless opus. Every gesture bespoke a mastery of the art of hospitality, as she effortlessly navigated the culinary landscape, guiding us through an exquisite culinary expedition with an artful flair, befitting a muse of gastronomic delights. Yet, it was not solely her consummate professionalism that bestowed upon this evening an ineffable allure. Grace, in her authentic and unassuming manner, cast a magnetic aura that transcended the realm of mere service. Like a luminary lighting up the dimmest corners of the heart, her presence was transformative, imparting upon life an aura of enchantment, where every moment was tinged with the hues of amity and warmth. As we delved into conversation, a revelation unfolded - beneath her eminence as a server lies a woman of genuine substance. Crocheting tales of her passion for the craft, she wove a rich tapestry of creativity and artistry that evoked admiration and inspired wonder. A symbiosis of sophistication and down-to-earth charm, she shattered the veneer of formality, fostering an environment where the soul could unabashedly unfurl its wings. In the sanctum of Strathcona Beer Company, Grace breathed life into the moments we shared, making them transcendental in their significance. Her essence was a talisman against the banality of existence, infusing life with new vigor and rendering it a joyful celebration of the human experience. With each stitch she wove into her craft, she mirrored the intricate fabric of her character, where grace, warmth, and authenticity intertwined to create an enigmatic whole. Grace, the embodiment of an alchemist, who turned ordinary moments into golden memories, leaving an indelible mark upon the canvas of my consciousness. In conclusion, to encounter Grace was not merely to savor her exceptional service but to be touched by the profound sense of fulfillment and enchantment she imparts upon all who cross her path. She is a luminary amid the mundane, casting an ethereal glow upon the human experience and making life seem not only more enjoyable but a magical journey worthy of marvel and exultation. Such a union of culinary expertise and genuine humanity elevates the realm of hospitality to an Ivy League of its own, an extraordinary synthesis that makes a visit to Strathcona Beer Company a testament to lifes remarkable beauty.

I love coming here with big groups of friends as its easy to find a seat. Its nice that there is always new beer to try and amazing food. The salads and pizza are equally as good as the beer. They also have wine and cider for the non-beer drinkers in the group and are kid friendly. Would totally recommend.
Amazing and friendliest service from Evelyn! The pizzas are to die for, beer is funky in  a good way, and the ambiance rocks overall.

Delicious beers on tap, especially if you like sours. Crispy winter radler and the love buzz blood orange sour were a few of our favorites. Cool vibe, neat merch and unreal food. If you re stopping in for a flight you must order the garlic bites with the garlic dip. 10/10!
Fantastic pizza restaurant that also sells beer! Jokes aside their beer and food menu is spot on. This well loved Strathcona establishment has fantastic rotating seasonal beers and beers to go.
Great atmosphere.  Pizzas are really good, and the tunes were amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Ryan. Thanks for the comments!

reviews.review_text: Was passing by so decided to stop in to try some beers. Wasnt really expecting too much but I actually really liked their space and also enjoyed the beers I tried. We got a flight of 4 for $7sth. Id definitely come back again
Fun, easy atmosphere and delicious pizza. Great last minute lunch. Super nice service.
Cool place, great vibes, plenty of space inside and out. Their sours are tasty (but beware, some are strong!). Awesome merch area, the sweaters are super soft.

Fantastic pizza. We also had kale salad and that was excellent, too.  They have 4 beer right now but you can only have 12 oz total for tasting or while eating in seated area. Oh yes, they have such nice seating area like a real restaurant. 5 star all the way around.
Good pizza, beer and atmosphere, not too big so it doesn t feel crowded inside. Very clean too

Honestly super impressed! The place has such a cool vibe.. the food is unreal! Very flavorful. The manager is great.. he knows his stuff as well as very personable. We will definitely be back! Thank you for the great experience !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for visiting our tasting room. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: This place is one of my favourite places to come by with friends for a beer or two. They have lots of variety and guest taps and offer sleeves, pints, flights, and even pitchers! Aside from their beers, their pizza is absolutely amazing! Their staff and service are amazing so make sure to come by!
Amazing atmosphere, good beer selection, fun little golf chipping game and friendly staff. Didn t order food while there, but the pizza looked awesome!

Possibly the overall nicest brewery Ive ever been to. Everything is perfectly put together. Flights are gorgeous, cups have a fantastic gold rim and logo, tables have proper footrests, staff was friendly, decor is fantastic, and most importantly, the beers were delicious.
Great local beer at a fair price with delicious pizza and appies. Hung out here twice this week while visiting Van, will definitely come back!

Totally worth the trip! They make some great beer and have a very good menu  . Whats more the design is the venue is truest stunning. The best is their trey for flights, each Microbrew now designs their own trey to carry the 4 oz cups for tastings called flights, and this place has the coolest feature - see in pic. Its magnetized!!!

It is by far the best bar I have been in Vancouver so far. The place has a well thought interior design, great beer selection, the staff is not on your back every five seconds, the food is delicious and most important of all, music is played at a normal volume (which seems to be a big problem with all Vancouver bar and restaurants, where you have literally shout for hours to communicate). I sincerely recommend this place. I enjoyed it and really wish it stays this way.

Amazing drinks! $10 cider that tastes like juice and a vegan pizza that is the BEST I ve ever had. That s a tough thing to beat with all the vegan joints in Vancouver but this is the best pizza I ve ever had in the last 10 years.
Fantastic beer and overall vibe. Do not miss!
Delicious beer and snacks, I recommend the garlic butter and Parmesan popcorn! Lots of seating and a good vibe. Come check it out!
Lovely interior design, great beer, pizza with a thin crust. Friendly staff. Nica ambiance and good music. This place is alright I guess...
Great beer. Great pizza. What more could you ask for?

The Hawaiian pizza is so good it hurts. I mean actually physically I am in pain because I came here to eat the Hawaiian pizza and it only comes in one size and I couldnt stop eating it so now Im sitting here, with a full pizza in my belly, writing this review because Im afraid to stand up, because I could not stop eating the delicious Hawaiian pizza they are here. Yes. No regrets.

Held a group gathering of 15 people at the pub. Amazing experience, drinks and customer service. Special shout-out to Conor, the manager for taking care of us really well. Highly recommend for big parties!
The service was friendly and personal. All the beers I tried were great. I especially loved the Belgian Blanche. The pizza is perfect, the Hawaiian is a must try!!
Treat yourself to the Hawaiian Pizza - delicious thin crust pizza that stays crisp.  Imperial Love Buzz sour is one of the best! Great service also.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed it!

reviews.review_text: I know my pizza, and I know what you are thinking... Wait what? I thought this was a beer place!? ... Well it is however their pizza is the best in town.  Some other locations compare close to the pizza but then you add the cornucopia of beers on tap.... And you experience a delightful time.  P.S. get the Diavola pizza.  Spicy!

Server on Jan. 31 in the morning was amazing.  Even though she was the only server and the place was packed she stayed cheerful and upbeat the whole time.  I had the imperial love buzz which was soooo good!  I was sad that it sold out so fast that I couldnt get cans to take home but I guess that is what happens when something is that good.  Cant wait to go back to try the fresh made pizza.

Come here all the time and always love the beer and food, but the staff are especially great. Tonight the staff went out of their way to ensure that someone who came in feeling unsafe got home okay   it was an extremely aware and benevolent effort, and I very much see this place as an important community fixture.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Less. Appreciate the kind words.

reviews.review_text: Have to update my review due to COVID. I have been continuously impressed by the staff (and beer) here during the pandemic. Always friendly and helpful, theyve been serving delicious take away beer and pizza during lockdown. Now the tasting room is open and the safety precautions in place so we can all come in to enjoy! Theres now a sweet patio outside to enjoy the summer weather too! Come here for amazing pizza & tasty beer - they are all phenomenal. Highly recommended for all your beer and pizza needs!
Craft beer, Pizza & Hip Hop!!! Special night with a DJ Legend! Awesome place!!

Onto the food! @strathconabeer is probably my favorite brewery in Strathcona and yes, there s a lot of great places to choose from but dog friendly patio, delicious pizza and radlers is definitely an award winning combo. Tell me a place that has all 3, I ll be waiting oh and free parking nearby. . . The Hawaiian pizza is my go to here - chunks of pineapple and drizzled with jalapeno cream. It is beyond heavenly   we tried the meat pizza for the first time during our pizza and lemme tell you - IT IS loaded with meat. They definitely didn t skimp out on the topping. . . As for their drinks, the pink lemonade is my go to, I ve also tried their other lemon mandarin racket before but found it abit to sour for my liking. Go and soak up some  before we get our 9 months of rain again . . Shout out to the staff for being so accommodating with the dogs! Their bowls were constantly refilled with water
Excelente!!! our server Nick was Outstanding!!! We were unsure what to order he provided his suggestions for the Time ma Poke and Wow!! We will definitely be back thanks nick!!! Enjoy Oaxaca!

Arguably the best beer in Vancouver, and the city is full of amazing breweries! I would note that Im partial to sours, and I look forward to all their Love Buzz/Imperial Love Buzz series beers. However, I would be remiss to not mention their pizza. How good is pizza made at a brewery, you may ask? Id say in contention with Via Tevere for best pizza in town. The pizza+beer combo is heavenly - you gotta experience it for yourself.
Staff were so kind and helpful, very lovely menu that is vegan friendly. We would have been there 4 nights in a row if we didnt get COVID on our first day in Vancouver.

This is a little gem. Great service, lovely owners that have a great passion for what they do. The meat pizza was to die for. Thin crust Italian style heaven. Old world style with a new world twist. The beer, oh the beer is spectacularly crafted. Take a tour and listen to Fez and his passion in this wonderful establishment that smells incredible. A must visit for anyone. There is wine, soda and kombucha as well, for those wanting to enjoy the delicious cuisine but prefer something other than beer. Product purchase is also available. I will be returning with friends, often.

We had a great time at Strathcona Beer Company! My first time here and Mitch was absolutely delightful, provided knowledgable, prompt, and warm service. The creamsicle beer was delicious and so was the summer veg speciality pizza!! Will come again!!

Best brewery atmosphere for a cozy gathering! So much visual stimulation - ugh, I m obsessed! We live next door and its our go-to spot. As a craft beer lover, Im always satisfied with the selection and theres frequently something new to try. And dont even get me started on the pizza - gotta try the funghi with the herb oil! Great beer, great pizza and great atmosphere. Not many breweries hit all 3 - theyre the real deal.
Best brewery in Vancouver. Pizza is among the best in the city

3 beers so far that I really enjoy.  The meat pizza is the best in Vancouver. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. Since we work within walking distance we have been coming in at least once a week and we havent been disappointed yet.
Ty was amazing as a server and bartender! It was my birthday today and he brought tasters to my table and we loved him! 10/10 service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you had a real nice time! I will let Ty know!

reviews.review_text: Garlic bites tossed in garlic oil salt and padano cheese   at Strathcona Brewery just delicious

Omg The most delicious pizza I ve had in Vancouver hands-down beats anywhere!! I love pizza from the states and I ve had a hard time finding anything in Vancouver that compares to the pizza I ve had in New York and places like that but this place is by far the best pizza to come close to American pizza. Nice thin crust amazing flavours stringy hot cheese just insanely good I was blown away!! Not to mention the homemade dips they make in house! You have to try their homemade ranch it s amazing !! Highly recommend this place!
Great pizza, great beer.

Un real. From beer to food, this place will literally blow your mind. Ive never felt so obliged to make a review, but this left me with no choice. Every bite/sip took me to another planet. 1,000,000/10. If there is just one suggestion I can make, is GET THE STUFFED DATES! Literally the best thing I have ever tasted in my entire life. I went to jupider. Had to order another round of the stuffed dates they were just THAT GOOD. Please... I beg the chef to never remove these from the menu... They are THAT good! Thank you for the epic taste bud experience, Strathcona!
They serve tasty beer and a DAMN GOOD PIZZA in a really cool environment.

Great place for small or big groups. Good choices of beer, and although I didn t order food, it looked and smelled really yummy. Went on Saturday around 10pm and it wasn t busy. Good crowd, vibe, and music. Would come back again!

Went for a friends birthday and aside from the great food and amazing beer the atmosphere and music choice alone is more than enough for a 5 star review. Good vibes and amazing beer. Love all the neon signs.

I really love Strathcona Beer Co, aside from excellent and interesting beers, they have solid food and, in my opinion, the best aesthetic of any micro brew in Vancouver. I think theyve done a fantastic job of capturing the ethos of their neighborhood and east van in general. From the lighting inside, to the design of the cans, to the logo, to the branding outside- they really are excellent. Definitely a favorite place of mine.

Ignoring some of the not so good reviews here we went to celebrate my wifes promotion to a new job, needless to say we were not disappointed, first time there and quickly we learned how the place works, even though it was busy we got our food very quick. The flight of beer  and the pizza were amazing, ask for the snack size pizza, you save 5 bucks and the pizza is slightly smaller than their menu pizza.
My favorite brewery on the bc ale trail. Great decor, menu, and beers. Found the first beer I ve truly loved here. Also loved the garlic knot bites and the lights on the walls. A+
Insanely good beer and awesome service and decor. Very highly recommended. You HAVE to get the Imperial Love Buzz, itll blow your mind. And the pizzas, so good.

This is the best brewery in town! Always a treat to be here. Love the setting - big open windows to let the summer breeze in - and the staff, and of course, the BEER! they make the best sour beers here. And the Headbanger IPA!?! Check this place out.
Delicious pizzas and meatballs, salads too. And of course tasty brews in a warm, cozy room.
Great beer, great vibes, and super friendly service! Oh and also, some of the best pizza Ive had in the city! (Particularly the Diavola pizza) Oh, how I love coming here again and again!
This is our favorite brewery to take visitors from out of town.  Great beers, great seating area, and great pizzas!  The love buzz grapefruit sour is my wifes favorite beer in the city :)

Strathcona Brewing Company has quickly become one of my favourite breweries in town. Their series of Love Buzz sours are outstanding, and their seasonal varieties are consistently creative and delicious. I always found something I love whenever I visit. As a bonus, they are host to Superflux, who frequently come out with some of the best hazy IPAs in the city. Their tasting room is very open and inviting, and they make a killer pizza too. If youre doing a brew-tour of the area, or if youre just looking for a bite and a break, they are a must visit.
Had an awesome time here. Only came for drinks but they were delicious. Awesome selection of beers and I loved the low key vibe of this spot as well. Will return!

Excellent thin  based pizzas apparently cooked in a wood - fired oven. Several varieties. I had the meat pizza which was really spicy. My wife had the mushroom served with rocket (rigula). Both grand. Several varieties of beer to taste.

Mushroom Alfredo pizza is out of this world! The space is large and bright and has a relaxed atmosphere. They also have 3 pitchers of cucumber, lemon and plain water so you can stay hydrated all summer!

Always enjoyed myself. Friendly staff, clean establishment with a nice environment. My experience is that the beer on tap are good choices, (personal favorite is the Wakey-Wakey Stout.) Potential criticism is that they have a limited selection.
The beer is excellent, with a great variety to choose from.  Their pizzas are equally good.  Nice atmosphere as well.  One of my favorited breweries in Vancouver.
Outstanding beer, great pizzas. Nice spot!
Had a funghi pizza and beer - winter radler and fresh hop sour. We loved all of it. The oils for the pizza are a nice touch. Without it the dough is a bit dry (normal I think, for the style).
Tasty pizza and some pretty good brews. We really enjoyed the oatmeal cookie stout and the love buzz imperial peach cobbler sour.
Great place! Super clean and open space. Always coming up with new beers and pizzas. Love that about them. 100% recommend.
I enjoyed the speciality brewed espresso coffee/chocolate beer. Ya gotta put that in your bucket list. Staff were fun and the pizzas looked good!

Strathcona BC is a solid stop for any craft brew enthusiast. They offer about 10 brews on tap at a time in addition to other bottles, wine, and kombucha. The owners and staff do it for the love of beer AND good food. This brewery actually has a really nice and fresh menu. If you dont order food, youll likely ogle any that comes out nearby. The brewery has a nice layout with a good flow, communal tables, and a huge art display. It may get loud depending on whats on the TV.
Attentive service, good beer and pizza!

Damn good beer in a bit of an interesting area. Always appreciated how its never packed to the brim when coming here like most other breweries. Usually have 5-6 beer options, most of which are actually quite good. Something for everyone. Even has cider, full food menu.
Really good beers and the pizza is amazing!!
Wonderful space for our team event! Food was delicious and plentiful; the beer choices were abundant and the staff were delightful. Would absolutely recommend!

Absolutely love this beer company for the passion and creativity they put into every flavor selection they produce and the alcohol content levels they can achieve without ruining the flavor of the beer truly amazing
Best vegan pizza Ive ever had, and their beer is exceptional
Fantastic Pizza, beer and environment!
Wow!!! This is the place to be. State of the art brewery with that funky neighborhood feel we all enjoy. Drop in for a pint and an amazing pizza. Youll be glad you did.
Great food, incredibly tasty beer, great staff and ownership. Highly recommend this place to everyone.
On of my favourite breweries in Greater Vancouver and definitely the one with the best decor and style. It is a great place for a birthday party, a work team dinner or a date night.
Amazing drinks, amazing service, chill and fun atmosphere!  Always a great time!
Hawaiian pizza rocked my little world. The salads are great too.
Good beer. Great service. Pizza was a little small for two, but the salad rounded it out.
Chic casual place to relax and grab a beer. Some food options. Has sour beers on tab. Chill atmosphere. Happy hour Mon-Thurs 3-6pm.
Excellent service, great beers on tap, sweet movie playing.
The blackberry sour was amazing and the nitro stout was delish. Try the superflux offering as well. Two brews in one stop if your keeping score.
I loved the vibe and the fact they have so many good beers and sour beers on tap. Pizza was pretty good too.
